data.event: Its origins go back to August 3rd 1607, with the name of "San Francisco de Joconguera" and under statement No 5.
It became a village in 1872 and on February 20th 1897 it was given the title of municipality under the administration of president Policarpo Bonilla as "Candelaria de Joconguera".
It became a village in 1872 and on February 20th 1897 it was given the title of municipality under the administration of president Policarpo Bonilla as "Candelaria de Joconguera".
It became a city on February 22nd 1939, after Antiguo de la Rañírez led a revolution to liberate the Candelarian people.
